title: Suggestion to prevent ARAM botting
body:
How about making a vertification such as, this photo, which champion is this or which summoner is that.

So how about making whenever you try to log in to lol, a vertification to prevent bots will appear and you have to fill that in.

It will prevent lots of aram bots from going in to boost account to level 30.

replies.body: I'm about to quit playing all together. I'm over the bots, and riot have done nothing about it. It's not hard, either make a bot reporting system, or some sort of authentication before each game. Do something riot. I've put money into this stupid game and you've let it gone to hell.

>log in to lol

Log in, then start the bot like most normal people would do.
